name: The Other Shore
description:
The Other Shore an RPG title that tells the wonderful story of heaven and earth. At the beginning of the creation of the world, God created a paradise to share divinity with man. However, man was deceived into sin, causing God to abandon man and paradise forever.

Since then, the world has been divided into two parts including the present world, which is full of war, conspiracy and abyss, which is full of spirit and sin. To return to the ideal paradise, people have been searching endlessly "Tears of God" because they possess mysterious powers. However, as the soul gradually awakens, the immediate question is whether humans should be wiped out of all sense of self and become lifeless beings?

name: Torte Le Magic
description: Tort Le Magic is a free doujin vertical shooting game by former Amusement Makers member Pietoro, featuring characters from the manga 10 Carat Torte! (天からトルテ!) and music composed by ZUN specifically for this game.

name: Sumorbit
description: A physics based fighting game where planets sumo wrestle. Grab with your moon and bounce with your planet to launch opponents out of the solar system.

name: Digital Seclusion
description: Isolated in a room repurposed into a personal shrine to esoteric Japanese media. Our nameless protagonist has dedicated himself to a collection of retro Japanese computer games, with a particular fondness for early visual novels. Although decaying in a slovenly existence to the untrained eye, his retreat into digital life is enriched by the scripted interactions with various charming 2D girls. His one purpose in life is to chronicle his thoughts and reflections on each of the digital worlds he immerses himself in. However, one day while pulling out the box of another visual novel to review, a girl leaps straight out of the cover art and begins interacting with him face to face. And perhaps most shocking of all to him, in a completely unscripted manner.

name: The Tail of CatPat
description: Follow CatPat and the gang on an amazing adventure!

name: NHL 23
description: NHL 23 is a rom hacked that updates NHL ‘94 for the 2023 playoffs. The hack aims to provide the most refined and realistic modern versions of this all-time classic game.

name: Sleep the Blackbird
description: Sleep the blackbird is a hand-drawn 2d puzzle game made in a form of comics with lovely watercolour illustrations and beautiful music. Follow the heart-warming story about Sonya and the blackbird who can't fall asleep. As the story unfolds, few puzzles will be on your way.

name: Old-Fashioned Way to Die
description: Sin descripción

name: Wrench to Restore Silence
description: Hand-drawn action platformer. Don't you sometimes want to get away from noise and crowds and just watch night sky? So does this little wolf who took a wrench and build a spaceship which took him to a nice and quiet planet. But suddenly he sees other spaceships are landing on his little planet. Can't they just leave him alone?!

name: Bugs make fine snacks
description: Bugs make fine snacks is a hand-drawn endless runner game with watercolour illustrations and cool music. Help our little short-sighted owl to fly in the night forest and look for yummy bug snacks. Be careful - don't touch the thorns.

name: Anti-Entropy
description: Anti-Entropy is a companion visual novel to Hoyoverse's Honkai Impact 3rd, set in the 1950s and covering the events that lead up to the formation of Anti-Entropy. It follows Tesla, Einstein, and Welt Yang's predecessor - Welt Joyce, who is the first Herrscher and sole survivor of the Berlin Honkai Eruption of 1952.

name: Durandal
description: A companion visual novel for Honkai Impact 3rd. Stars a younger Durandal and Rita Rossweisse on their mission in the Sea of Quanta to investigate a bubble universe.

name: Dice Catcher
description: Battle your way through the dungeon and collect back all of your magic dice!

name: RPS-25
description: The ultimate game of rock, paper, siccors with more than just the regular three options.

name: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin'
description: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin' is a unique fusion of traditional turn-based roguelikes and twin-stick shooters. A fast-paced take on strategy games where you dodge deadly bullet patterns and kill enemies for their money - all at your own pace

name: It is as if you were doing work
description:
The robots are here! No more work! It’s great! Is it great?! Wait! You feel apathetic and unproductive! You miss clicking buttons! You miss waiting for progress bars! You miss checkboxes! You miss work! But it’s going to be okay! Use this handy application and it is as if you were doing work!

It is as if you were doing work is a work of speculative play, presenting a vision of a possible/near-future in the form of an application that helps people pretend they’re doing standard-issue computer work. Jump in an answer emails, write documents, click check boxes, and so much more!

name: Cursor*10: 2nd session
description:
Cursor*10 [2nd session] is the sequel to Cursor*10, a puzzle game where the player controls a cursor and the goal is to reach the sixteenth floor of a level in a race against time. During the course of the game, events will loop when time runs out and the player is able to cooperate with a past version of himself, as all the previous actions of the cursor can still be seen and influence the current session.

As such, eventually up to ten cursors will cooperate to reach the sixteenth floor, clicking boxes to open them, mounting stairs and pressing buttons simultaneously. The graphics are drawn as outlines in black and white, shown from an isometric perspective.

This edition features both recurring and new puzzles, including a deadly spear that can pin your cursor, instantly killing it, and a key to unlock a box. This version also introduces sound, unlike the first game. Apart from that, the gameplay mechanics are completely identical.

name: Raiding.Zone
description: Raiding.Zone​ is a pve arena game inspired by World of Warcraft and Warframe. The gameplay is oriented around the roles Tank, Healer and Damage-Dealer.

name: Mazogs
description: Mazogs is a maze video game developed by Don Priestley and published for the ZX81 by Bug-Byte in 1982. It was subsequently licensed by Softsync and published in the US for the Timex Sinclair 1000.

name: Fiona's Farm
description: Welcome to Fiona’s Farm! The most exciting farm adventure full of mysteries and love triangles. Solve colorful blast puzzles to earn energy and coins. Then, use them to help Fiona renovate the damaged buildings and hearten the farm. A breathtaking journey awaits!

name: Nijuubako
description: The Nijuubako fandisc featuring 2 scenarios.

name: Sabotage
description: Blow up as many boxes as you can before the guard sees you. Or play as the guard and try to find the saboteur.

name: Picture Cross Towns
description: Solve picross / nonogram style puzzles, and watch them transform into a blossoming little town scene!

name: ShenSonic
description:
ShenSonic is a fan game made by SimSonic, whose real name is Simon Elo, of Magitek Soft which has also created the Sonic in Mobius games. This fan game was previously created using The Games Factory but the final version used Multimedia Fusion Express.

ShenSonic is Shenmue but with Sonic characters and makes changes to the plot to fit the Sonic universe. It features 100+ characters, 4 locations, 8 mini-games, day and night cycle, QTE's, inventory system, and much more.

name: Chaotix of Tomorrow
description: Chaotix of Tomorrow is a fan made Sonic RPG made by Magnus Andersson using RPG Maker 2000, it stars the Chaotix crew featuring the return of Mighty. The game was later updated in 2006 to add better graphics and new features. The creator originally did not plan to create a sequel to the game, but a sequel was made anyway titled Twisted Mettle.

name: Twisted Mettle
description: The sequel to Chaotix of Tomorrow

name: Forces of Mobius
description: Forces of Mobius the third game in the series of Magnus Andersson RPGs.

name: Tails and the Quest of 100 Rings
description: Tails and the Quest of 100 Rings is a fan game created by Magnus Andersson (aka mightydillo). A demo was initially released publicly with one zone in 1997. It was only the second Klik & Play Sonic-based fan game to ever hit the internet. A completed version was released in mid-1998. A demo for this game was released in the Sonic Klik & Play Collection.

name: Tails Race
description: Created by Magnus Andersson/mightydillo, who himself created one of the first Sonic Fan Games.

name: Tails Quest 2: A Tale of Love
description: The last of the handful of fangames made by Magnus Andersson aka mightydillo using Kilktopia.

name: Sonic Boom
description:
Sonic Boom was the first Klik & Play Sonic fan game to hit the internet. It was created by Martin Braid in 1995. The initial release had a virus, so it was taken down temporarily. It was re-released in 1996 by Magnus Andersson.

Due to the open-sourced nature of Klik and Play, Sonic Boom later re-appeared in saxman's Sonic Klik & Play Collection along with demos of Sonic PC and Tails and the Quest of 100 Rings. It was also re-released as Rotor Boom by Ian Klukan, the Archie character Rotor Walrus replacing Sonic.

name: O Aventureiro
description: O Aventureiro is a text-adventure where in search of an adventure, you clandestinely teleport aboard a cargo ship whose crew is made up of exotic beings from various planets. Your objective is to accumulate all the money you can by searching the ship's rooms.

name: Piramide Inca
description: Piramide Inca is a game for the ZX81 where your mission is to explore one of the sacred pyramids of the Incas where, according to an ancient legend, one of their greatest chiefs was buried along with all their fabulous treasure.

name: USS-Enterprise
description: USS-Enterprise is an unofficial strategy game based on Star Trek, where you are James Kirk, and your mission is to destroy all Klingon ships in the galaxy.

name: Aventura & Mistério
description: Aventura & Mistério is a collection of games by Ciberne Software where you need to prove your intelligence and agility by trying to overcome the obstacles in these five thrilling adventures, including two Portuguese versions of pre-existing games and three original games developed by Ciberne.

name: Desterium
description:
Since the beginning of the game, each character has a race that determines their physical form and a class that determines what they excel at in the game. Throughout the game, each player's character learns skills that will determine how successful (or not) they will be at their trade. The first two attributes (race and class) are chosen by the player when creating his character. The skill attribute mainly depends on the experience during the game and is deeply influenced by the way of playing and the preferences of each player.

The action takes place in a fictional virtual world where you take the role of a character who interacts with other characters, whether they are controlled by other players or by non-player characters. All the interactions take place in a fantastic environment like in a traditional role-playing game. You can chat with other characters on the screen, and through interactions, trade, trade, make friends, or other activities. We are waiting for you at Desterium!

name: Summer Album
description: A doujin of "White Album" that revolves around Morikawa Yuki.

name: Eien
description: A doujin game based on Tactics' "One ~Kagayaku Kisetsu e~", with Kawana Misaki as main character.

name: Carmageddon 64
description: The version of Carmageddon 64 released in Germany has the pedestrians changed to dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals as a censorship measure.

name: Carmageddon
description: Due to being very controversial at the time, Carmageddon was censored in many countries, changing pedestrians for zombies with green blood. An official mod which changed the game back to its original state was later uploaded online by the developers.

name: Polybius
description:
A fan-made Atari 2600 game centered around the Polybius myth that was made by Lost Classics and distributed at Retro Gaming Expo 2013, and then distributed again by Hard Copy Games in 2018.

Polybius is a unique game of skill and strategy. Take control of a computerized starship combat system to destroy a swarm of relentless alien enemies. Enjoy addictive gameplay with arcade-realistic graphics and sound. Challenge your friends and family to get the lowest possible score. Can you be the one to reach zero?

name: Carmageddon
description: The German version of Carmageddon was the most censored version, with the pedestrians changed to robots which spilled black oil.

name: Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
description: In many regions, the game was censored, changing the pedestrians to zombies with green blood.

name: Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
description: The German version of Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now had the pedestrian changed to aliens as a censorship measure.

name: Carmageddon
description: Game Boy Color port of Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now.

name: SM
description: A Super Metroid decompilation for PC.

name: Sorority Rites
description:
In the year 2014, Myles finds her world crashing down as she finds herself the target of a mysterious college organization known as The Sorority. Horror reaches new heights for Myles as she is coerced into staying at an abandoned mansion, but the unexpected company from a new friend may just give her the courage she needs.

Uncover the roots of evil in Sorority Rites, a kinetic visual novel horror game that reveals the dark pasts of characters from the AppSir Games Universe.

name: Saorin to Issho!!
description: Sin descripción

name: NeonHClouds
description: In this shooting game, the gorgeous effects and easy-to-use gameplay allow for a thrilling and exciting experience in every battle.

name: Zombie Defense
description: A cooperative game for 4 players, you are a fighter of a special purpose unit, your task is to destroy waves of zombies by taking convenient positions and using tricks

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Temple at Zerzura
description: The ultimate sand trap—the Sahara Desert—recedes after a thousand years, revealing a mini golf course fit for an Egyptian king and queen! Putt through the serene dunes, vast throne room, and great pyramids as you search for clues and lost balls within the forgotten temple.

name: Wukong Odyssey
description: Wukong Odyssey is an epic adventure game with a classic platformer-style gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours. As the fearless hero, Sun Wukong, you'll embark on an incredible journey through a magical world filled with danger and excitement.

name: X-Dead Detective
description: A single player, first person shooter, adventure game featuring voice acting and story. Explore space stations and future city environments, collect items to further your investigation. A somewhat gritty, storydriven, cyberpunk-ish, drone shooting, FPS game.

name: Xel: Breaking Time
description: A new chapter of Reid's story awaits. Travel back in time to the Xel, meet old friends, make new ones and change the future.

name: Zcrew: The Void Realm
description: Survive the post-apocalyptic world and face the rise of the Void! In the "Void Realm" DLC, you can once again improve your strength and prepare for future missions. Fight alone or join forces with your friends, challenge the levels, break through the limits, and dominate the Void!

name: Shepherd's Crossing
description:
Shepherd’s Crossing is a different kind of box garden simulation game that pursues the fun of increasing what you want and creating the landscape of your choice.

You have been entrusted with a miniature garden (farm)! Use the farm to raise animals and crops. Animals and crops can be exchanged with others. While there may be a main story, the ultimate goal is up to you. There are no time limits, so enjoy creating a relaxed and carefree farm landscape!

name: StarCore Legacy
description: Remake to 2016's Legends of the Universe - StarCore, a Metroidvania style Action-Platformer with several abilities, enemies and areas to explore.

name: The Milked Busty Stepsister
description: The Milked Busty Stepsister (all characters are 18+ and no character get hurt in this video game), sex Simulator where you will be able to penetrate hard penis to vagina and make an incredible pleasure to make the vagina squirt and wet

name: The Swordsmen X: Green-bamboo pack
description: This DLC item is a construction blueprint (not a finished product). Green Bamboo Weapons need to be forged at level 8 to unlock and make them. Green Bamboo Houses need to be built at level 16 to unlock and make them. It takes a long time in the game, so please buy carefully!

name: The Revolt Fire Rising
description: The revolt fire rising, traitors are everywhere. Is the council working for you or the enemy? Is the army on your side or are they against you? Answers will bring more questions

name: Tulgey Wood
description: Tulgey Wood is a magical adventure game inspired by the classic tale of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Rainy Day
description: Rainy Day is a point and click adventure game that contains our beautiful and sad memories.

name: Mine
description: Mine is a horror game in the style of back rooms. Accompanied by an excellent visual, it will allow you to plunge into the nightmare happening around the hero. Realistic camera and sounds complement your emotions. And monsters will create tension and make you pretty scared.

name: Life of Pi
description: This is a Survival Simulator, you having to chop down tress, collect stones to make your tools and weapon, there are many customizable thermal weapon you can choose to fight demons or other players, you can also driving through the desert, grasslands and snow mountain, you have to help Pi survive.

name: Merge & Blade: Berserker
description: 'Berserker' is a character whose damage increases more and more when hit. It's a character that gets stronger and stronger the more you fight at the front, and it's always hungry for battle.

name: Merge & Blade: Mineral mine
description: Assemble the best units to mine minerals.

name: Merge & Blade: Puppy Charater
description: "Puppy" barks loudly at enemies! This is a great addition to the battle, as many enemies will stiffen after hearing his bark. By the way, this guy is nice and doesn't bite, so don't be scared.

name: Fantasy Fighters
description: Prepare for epic battles in "Fantasy Fighters"! Choose your faction, plan your moves, and unleash devastating attacks on your opponents in local multiplayer. Explore a rich world filled with engaging characters.

name: Alter Ego
description: Alter Ego is a 2D point-and-click narrative-based adventure game featuring psychological elements. Explore two levels with atmospheric environments, solve puzzles, and use your inventory items to uncover the mystery behind Reese and Winona's relationship, and find the real culprit—if there is one.

name: Inochi no Nai Uta
description: Experience 7 games like enjoying a music album. An omnibus work featuring a dark and mysterious world view with the theme of "death and life" and a unique game system with a music player motif.

name: Sugar Sweet Temptation
description: On the whimsical Night of the Fairies, Crow Yamada lands on the rooftop of a quaint patisserie known as Folkroll. Without any memories, he strives to help the cute employees by becoming the best baker around in this sugary sweet visual novel.

name: Survival for Treasure
description: Welcome to the world of "Zombie Treasure Hunt," an exciting survival game where you must face hordes of zombies to reach your goal. The game is divided into two thrilling modes: campaign mode and online mode.

name: Survival Shooter
description: This is a first-person shooter game where you use various weapons to defeat enemies and explore the world. You must manage your health, use limited resources wisely, in order to survive in this challenging world.

name: Space Guardian
description: Robots have launched an attack on humans, and the space guardian force is dispatched to fight to defend the earth! This is a fast-paced arcade-style casual car battle game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever.

name: Starjet Fights
description: Starjet 3D Space War Shoot 'em up

name: Square Wave
description: Square wave is an Arcade game inspired from the old classics. Push Away the Squares before they pass through the arena, And Survive for as long as you can and Get The Highest Score.

name: Square Brain
description: In this fast-paced puzzle game, rearrange squares of different colors, as quickly as you can, to match the winning arrangement. Do so with as large a grid as you can.

name: Worms Rumble: Cats & Dogs Double Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Worms Rumble: Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack
description: Worms in Spaaaaaace! Kit out your Worm with outfits, banners, emotes, weapon skins and titles that are out of this world!

name: Catacomb Master
description:
Catacomb Master is a 2d platform game in which you have to play as a treasure hunter cat. Go down into the depths of the catacombs for treasures, use your bow and arrows, test your ingenuity.

Find treasures to become a true Catacomb Master.

name: Space Fighter 2
description: "Space Fighter 2" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Slime Knight
description: Use an extendable slime arm to “dissolve”, punch, grab, and throw enemies in order to save your slime brethren and navigate through the decrepit insides of an ancient Worm in this top-down hoard battler.

name: Sky Division
description: Lost on a desert island with a wounded enemy pilot and no resources, can you cooperate even though you are enemies? or will you kill each other? Sky division is a visual novel that deals with themes such as the meaninglessness of war and unrequited love.

name: Skiing Frenzy
description: It's skiing day! Skiing Frenzy is a 2D top-down, retro-style ski game where you can play Slalom and Free Ski modes, each one giving you different challenges and lots of fun.

name: Simply Survive
description: Simply Survive is a 2D bullet hell survival experience where you the player battle through waves of enemies to just survive as long as possible.

name: Shovelboy
description: Shovelboy is a retro-style platformer where you have to collect shovels in 21 increasingly difficult small levels. How fast can you go?

name: Shadow Saboteur
description: Shadow Saboteur is an exciting 2D side-scrolling adventure game where players take on the role of Robin Hood, robbing from the rich and giving to the poor. Players must avoid the sight of enemy soldiers and steal money

name: Serene Hike
description: Serene Hike is the perfect game for anyone looking to unwind and escape from the stresses of daily life. With its beautiful graphics and tranquil atmosphere, you'll feel like you're really in the heart of the forest. So why wait? Start your journey today and experience the serenity of Serene Hike.

name: Sea Dove
description: The man in the black sphere needs you to catch him some fish, but to what end?

name: Russell's Range
description: Complete tasks and keep the range running while following the rules and avoiding the creatures that lurk in the shadows.

name: Number8
description: Sci-Fi 3D first/third person corridor shooter with full free movement, dynamic controls, destruction physics and a variety of enemy types. Your protagonist woke up in an unknown place, with no memory of who she is, but with combat skills. Get out alive and try to understand the place you're in.

name: Paradise Cleaning!: Sexual Massage shop - Akari
description: Paradise Cleaning!- sexual massage shop -AKARI- - is super-casual action game. All you have to do is just cleaning out all dirty icons by dragging over them within the time limit. There are 5+1 dirty icons and each of them can be cleaned by the corresponding Cleaning tools.

name: Respawn
description: "Respawn" is an independent adventure game in which you will play the role of a ghost and initiate adventures belonging to the ghost. The game not only has a rich plot, but also has a unique. From the depths of the earth all the way to the sun, killing and protecting, everything is up to you!

name: PlasmaBlast 1.0.0 Beta
description: This game is still in development but is still playable, so I have released it early! When playing the game with your friends one person choses to be the mech (The boss) and everyone else can chose one of their favorite characters to try and beat the boss.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Dinosaurs
description: Poly Jigsaw: Dinosaurs is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a dinos.

name: Puncherman!: First Day
description: Puncherman!: First Day is a first-person comedy physics dad simulator where you play as a retired FPS hero/generally manly man trying to become the best dad ever. One problem: the only way he can interact with the world is with an incredible punch. Use your fists of fury to prove your heart of gold!

name: Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension
description: Runic Defenders:Trials of Ascension is an action game where you control four humanoid characters with unique abilities and weapons. Your goal is to survive by defeating enemies using your characters' skills.As you kill enemies, you earn XP materials to upgrade your characters and make them stronger.

name: Robots: Invaders
description: Robots: Invaders is a first-person 3D adventure game. You wake up early in the morning and realize that the robots no longer obey you, they were attacked by a virus. Alien forces have taken over their minds. Grab your weapons and fight back the invaders!

name: Roach Invasion
description: You are about the same size as a cockroach, and you must use every means at your disposal to destroy the massive numbers of "Gs" that are crawling on the ground, on the walls, and even falling from the ceiling.

name: Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game
description: Draft a deck of cards against an AI opponent then battle them in tower defense-inspired card combat. A 2013 adaptation of the card game, released the same year.

name: Meatgun
description: The top-down roguelike shooter where your ammunition is edible. Delve into The Facility and fight off hordes of mutant vegetables with your Meatgun: Shoot meat to damage enemies, and eat meat to heal. Collect various items and combine their effects to become a powerful, veggie-killing machine.

name: Mech Mastery
description: Mech Mastery is an exciting new game that combines tower defense strategy with epic robot battles against alien invaders

name: MimiK
description: Mimik is a local multiplayer game in which players hide, seek and tag each other. One player is "it", the rest attempt to hide hide in a crowd of NPCs. During matches every puck is visible, the only way to hide is to mimic NPC behavior. There is nowhere to hide except in plain sight.

name: Mushroom Pin
description: Mushroom Pin is a relaxing but challenging puzzle game. You need to put the mushroom pins in the correct socket according to the rules of the levels.

name: Murder Cases
description: You find yourself locked in your own home, in the middle of a crime scene, and without your recent memories. In this horror scenario, you will find a stranger wandering the house and making your escape unlikely. Solve all the puzzles, find out what happened, and recover your missing memories.

name: Mystic Blast
description: Mystic Blast is an exciting puzzle defense game that will test your skills and strategic thinking. In this game, you need to connect two or more matching tiles to clear them from the board and defend against waves of attacking enemies.

name: NTBSS: Master Character Training Pack - Minato Namikaze (Reanimation)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Minato Namikaze (Reanimation) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season Final Part 1
description: This is the tale of a girl who loses everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Noel and her team are ready for the final battle and split into two groups to begin their actions. Their long revenge story is finally running to an end!

name: Laruaville Match 3 Puzzle
description: That's the first game in the Laruaville series! It has some new interesting Match 3 mechanics you won't see in other games, plus Mahjong ( try it! This mahjong is totally different from regular mahjongs! ) and some Spot The Difference scenes. Plus building the town.

name: Lichkeeper
description: Build traps and fling magic to protect the crystal heart that holds your immortal soul from an onslaught of wizards who are hell bent on destroying you!

name: Hyper Hentai Bikini Party
description: Hyper Hentai Bikini Party is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of bikini and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hypno-Mart
description: A short visual novel about a stylish blonde-dyed part-timer who works the night shift.

name: I Commissioned Some Frogs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many frogs and flies as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: In His Time
description: This is a 2D adventure game of puzzle solving. As you control Ollie, a young boy, use your head to overcome the many obstacles that stand in your way. To obtain items, you may need to persuade characters or win mini-games. Through these, players will get to know the world even better.

name: Interstellar Expedition
description: Interstellar Expedition is a futuristic side-scrolling shooter game, where players can control their spacecraft using the mouse and engage in thrilling space battles. In the game,

name: Invasion: Family Ties
description: Rick travels to Indiana to visit his mother, but during his stay, unexpected events occur that lead him on a thrilling adventure. However, little does he know that a major threat looms on the horizon that will change everything. Will Rick be able to save the day and protect those he cares about?

name: Jump Up, Jerry!
description: Jump Up, Jerry! is an arcade platformer where you have to jump your way through different types of cable cars and enemies in order to reach for your highest score.

name: Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat
description: Jump, Dodge, Die, Repeat is a rage fueling, adventure game, filled with unpredictable obstacles. Help Isani complete his impossible task, a task that was given to him by his maker at the moment of his creation.

name: Japanese Rail Sim: Operating the Meitetsu Line
description: A railway operating game that puts you behind the controls of a train in Japan on the Nagoya Meitetsu Railway! Take on and experience the role of a professional train operator and challenge yourself to this high-speed, FMV game.

name: Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure
description: Play as Jane Austen, English novelist, in this 2D platforming adventure. Explore 8-bit England, fight enemies with your quill, and confront characters from Jane Austen's novels!

name: It Belongs in a Museum
description: It Belongs in a Museum is a Rogue-lite, treasure hunting, artifact collection VR story game. Join a shadow organization and help its weakened, resurrected goddess search for magic treasures to undo the curse they unleashed in procedural dungeons, tombs, lost cities, and ancient ruins.

name: LaborSurviveManual
description: 2D pixel TPS game, Through the keyboard control move and attack, Defeat the enemy gain experience to upgrade and strengthen weapons to live as much as possible.

name: Kreeps
description: Kreeps is a tower defense game where you choose how your towers and the enemies scale as the game progresses. Use any combination of 7 different types of towers and weapons to defend against the growing Kreep horde.

name: Expel
description: You become a ghost and surprise, attack, and curse the ghost investigators who come to your house. You can scare them however you like, and later replay the game from the investigator's point of view to see what kind of ghost you were.

name: Fire and Maneuver: Expansion - Boshin War
description: Join the Boshin War as Imperialists or Shogunate loyalists in the second expansion to The Armchair Historian's Fire & Maneuver. Take charge during the turbulent end of Japan's samurai era, or ignite East vs. West clashes with inventive scenarios!

name: G.O.P.O.T.A
description: And you're a chubby guy?

name: Ghost Fake
description: Multiplayer masked action game "Ghost Fake" is an online game where players are divided into the masked ones and survivors to compete against each other. The masked ones use the power of the mask to capture survivors, while survivors use gimmicks to escape!

name: Forever In The Backrooms
description: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level offers various escape routes but also introduces perilous obstacles. Players can immerse themselves in the seemingly boundless and unsettling levels of the backrooms, experiencing the game's eerie and intricate mazes.

name: Fish 'N' Chips
description: A fisherman must find his cat "Chips". Take up the challenge, swing through the levels, and save your friend!

name: Friends World
description: Kakao Friends Defense game has been released in VR. Enjoy Friends' various skins and VR defense games!

name: Forbidden Sparks of Passion
description: Forbidden Sparks of Passion is an adult-only visual for adults! This fascinating story tells about a young man who fell in love with his neighbor and fucked her more than once! However, she had a husband who was extremely unhappy with what was happening.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Counter Blow
description: The offensive of 4A of Volkhov Front on Tikhvin, in November 1941. The Red Army is trying to block the German forces from 39AC in the Tikhvin area. German units are transferring reserves to this sector of the front.

name: Grandma's Cheese
description: You play as Grandpa, you come home after a long day out drinking with the lads, and there is nobody there so you call out for your wife (Grandma) and she doesn't answer. You see that tasteful-looking cheese on the counter, and you can't resist.

name: Hexceed: Ignis Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Ignis Puzzle your way through 115 new levels - All levels include the brand new "Spiral" mechanic!

name: Horror Maze 2
description: Horror Maze is back and even scarier than before

name: Cat Search in Medieval Times
description: Can you find all the hidden cats in this medieval city? More than 100 cats needs to be found! Sit back, relax, and explore this beautifully hand-drawn city.

name: Hentai Maid Memories
description: Hentai Maid Memories is a relaxing puzzle game. Flip tiles and find their match to reveal the sexy maid art beneath. 20 beautiful girls are waiting for you.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Gambler
description: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Gambler within the game.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Mech Pilot
description: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Mech Pilot within the game.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 4
description: Dirty Room Chapter 4 DLC

name: Disney Speedstorm: Standard Founder's Pack
description: Start your engines and hit the track with the Standard Founder's Pack!

name: Disney Speedstorm: Ultimate Founder's Pack
description: Go full throttle in style with the Ultimate Founder's Pack!

name: Naruto: Path of the Ninja
description: Naruto: Path of the Ninja is a video game released in Japan only for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Don Duality: Initiation
description: Don Duality Initiation is a Prologue version of the game where you will experience a thrilling 9-day journey to the top. Send gangsters to collect debts, rob banks, and launder money through your restaurant.

name: Elevator
description: Find a way to escape by combining items in a closed apartment. However, beware of the ghost that lurks...

name: Dr Wan
description: It is a game that clears the dungeon by avoiding numerous monsters using the main character's skills. It's a 3D quarter view game. Let's use gas, punch, uppercut, rolling, defense, running, throwing, etc. well. Let's solve the dungeon puzzle well. Let's make good use of the dungeon traps.

name: Ed's world story
description: Protagonist 'Ed' lives in Kakariko village. He wants to become an adventurer who explore this great world. You can join Ed's adventure... find out a secret of the world.

name: Enchanted Voyage
description: "Enchanted Voyage" is a creative and imaginative horse-drawn carriage parkour game

name: Everfall
description: In Everfall, experience a dark and surreal post-apocalyptic world like never before. This old school action platformer will take you on a journey through pixelated landscapes, filled with danger and adventure.

name: Cluster Tower
description: "Cluster Tower" is an Arkanoid-style game where you'll have to help a skeleton return to the tower and reclaim its rightful place at the top.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 03
description: Season 2 Episode 3: Blessnote! Kitty attempts to prove her true identity to Juvie but the journey to Hella from Haven is loaded with distractions.

name: Cursed House Match 3 Puzzle
description: One of the most innovative Match 3 games with 10 unique mechanics you won't see in other games! Use your Match 3 skills to banish evel spirits!

name: Day Of Dead
description: 'Day Of Dead' is a casual game with the theme of terror. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.

name: Cruo Domine
description: Survive in a hostile space environment with randomized damage, drop and enemy strength. Adjust difficulty yourself dynamically with upgrading weapons, but be careful not always the upgrade succeeds.

name: 3D Puzzle: Vintage House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Amalgamare
description: In this 2D horror adventure game, play as the protagonist May as she is siphoned into a horrific new world on Halloween night. In a brave feat of love for her cat Matilda, May embarks on a gruesome journey through an otherworldly environment where she must utilize her wits to find her way out.

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey - End of the story
description: Discover the full saga of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey with this enthralling Full-Story-Unlock DLC! Uncover Fenrir's untold story, unveil the secrets behind his fury, and rescue Midgard from doom.

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2023 GT World Challenge Pack
description: Assetto Corsa Competizione 2023 GT World Challenge DLC places you at the heart of the action from the 2023 season. This brand new DLC adds an additional 3 new cars as well as the world-famous track, Circuit Ricardo Tormo - Valencia.

name: Blooby Block
description: Help Block rescue his friends from the terrible bluebies. This cube pushing puzle Game is an evolution of the clasic sokoban/box pushing type games in a multilevel 3D. Enemies, spells and traps add another level of complexity. The difficulty grows fast, and the puzles become unforgiving very soon.

name: Biki Biki Flip
description: Biki Biki Flip - The Ultimate Jumping Adventure!

name: Ball Wall
description: Can you avoid all enemies in time? In this fun game you have to get as far as possible between the enemies and you can collect coins. You can use the bottom wall, but also the top wall. The further you progress in the game, the more types of enemies you will encounter.

name: Auto Mechanic Sim
description: Auto Mechanic Sim is an exciting game that puts you in the driver's seat of a car service business.

name: Busy Bee
description: Build cells, guard home, collect nectar, store honey and survive the winter.

name: Car Parkour
description: Are you bored of doing the same thing? Take a break and try this racing game of Car Parkour!

name: Burger Impact: Solar Strike
description: Burger Impact is a surreal high-speed physics-based 3d action game built in Unreal Engine 5. As Burger, a space-faring fast food on an adventure to rescue French Fries, engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system,” orbiting and launching objects to battle and overcome challenges!

name: 2021: Moon Escape
description: A classic 90's adventure that will keep you in suspense will make you smile at times and will thrill you in every moment!

name: Akai Ito: HD Remaster
description: Japanese adventure game. Set in the present age, the game unfolds from the point of view of Kei Hato, a girl who has a special blood called "Nieno Chi". A special system called the blood sucking system is used.

name: Amaze!: Level Pack 1
description:
Looking for more challenges and excitement in your favorite game? Look no further than our latest DLC - Level Pack 1 !

With this DLC, you'll get an extra 150 levels in Classic mode and an additional 50 levels in Limited Moves.

Take on new challenges and test your skills with the added levels. Can you beat them all and become the ultimate champion? There's only one way to find out - get your copy of Level Pack 1 DLC today!

name: Amaze!: Level Pack 2
description:
Are you ready for an even greater challenge in your favorite game? Our DLC - Level Pack 2 - is here to take your gameplay to the next level!

With Level Pack 2 you'll get an extra 150 levels in Classic mode and an additional 50 levels in the more challenging Time Rush mode. Can you beat them all and become the ultimate champion?

Upgrade your game now and discover the exciting new world of challenges and adventures that await you with Level Pack 2 DLC.

name: Aoi Shiro: HD Remaster
description: Japanese adventure game. Aoi Shiro is an adventure game that sets stage in both the modern real world and a mythical world. Aoi Shiro takes place in the same universe as its predecessor, Akai Ito.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang the Video
description:
Clear the stage by defeating all the Cozmo Gangs in the Gang.
If you hit the enemy's attack, you will lose one "Hyper Beat", and if you lose everything, the game will be over.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Full original game “Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg”
Gust Extra BGM Pack
"Another Look" Costume Set（Set of 33)

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Director's Cut
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Brain Memory: Complete Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

Let them become masters of their own minds with the Figures Pack!

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - GOTY Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys GOTY Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Bocchi the Escape
description: In Bocchi the Escape you play as Bocchi, who has a nightmare about box mazes being chased by her friends.

name: Cyber Neon Bundle
description:
Step into the neon-soaked world of Cyber Vibes with Cyber Neon Bundle - where you'll hunt, slash and survive your way to victory in two adrenaline-fueled games!
Cyber Neon Bundle is a collection of two cyber theme games; Cyberhunt and Razortron 2000. Both are frenetic action games where you’ll use your skills to win everything!

name: Dig Deep: Chunky Pets
description:
Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!
Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

name: Waves Running Simulator
description: Have you seen the enormous waves destroying the planet? If not, you are in the right place! In Waves Running Simulator you have to escape from the tsunami as fast as possible.

name: The Treflik Family: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of The Treflik Family includes the game plus the "Cure for Treflinka" DLC.

name: Plague Universe
description:
Bundled together 3 games within the Plague Universe:

- Death Tales, a action platforming rpg.
- Plague Road, a turn based rogue lite rpg.
- War Theatre, a turn based strategy rpg.

name: Perquisite Strata X
description: A Boom-compatible port of the exclusive levels found in the PSX port of DOOM.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Platinum Edition
description:
Game includes:
15+ Stages
30+ Weapons

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Extended Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
description: Become the pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!

name: Pixel Paint: Complete Edition
description: Have fun and relax in Pixel Paint. Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 10
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with the tenth DLC pack!

This additional content includes:

- "Wild Head" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Body" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Arms" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Waist" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Legs" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set

name: GigaBash: Godzilla 4 Kaiju Pack
description:
The Godzilla DLC adds 4 new playable characters from the Godzilla universe: Godzilla, Gigan, Mechagodzilla, and Destoroyah!

Reenact the Godzilla vs. Destoroyah final battle, or play as your favorite GigaBash character and test your mettle against the OGs of the Tokusatsu genre. Each of these new characters has its own unique abilities and movesets, featuring iconic attacks as seen in the films, along with various easter eggs to invoke your long-lost nostalgia.

name: B Cannon
description:
B Cannon is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are moving around the screen and can reverse your direction by pressing a button. Your goal is to shoot the circles that are bouncing around. You aim automatically and shoot at the current aim position. Hold a button to shoot. The circles break up into smaller ones and you have to shoot them until they can no longer be broken down.

The game is over when you touch any circle.

name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas - Digital Edition
description: Lead a group of interstellar pilots dedicated to free the Atlas Star System from Grax and the Forgotten Legion. Start your adventure with 4 Starships, 6 pilots, and 12 weapons – all included.

name: Paratopic + Urban Flow
description:
Experience two unique and captivating games with the Paratopic + Urban Flow bundle on Xbox:

Paratopic - Enter a fever dream world with Paratopic, an experimental horror game that takes you on a thrilling narrative-driven adventure. Unravel the stories of three characters through numerous vignettes and explore the detritus of forbidden industry.

Urban Flow - Control the traffic lights and ensure that everything runs smoothly in Urban Flow, a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. With over 150 levels and local co-op mode, Urban Flow offers hours of entertainment for players of all ages.

Discover the subtle beauty of city streets and unravel thrilling stories with the Paratopic + Urban Flow bundle on Xbox. Don't wait any longer, grab your copy today and experience the best of both worlds!

name: Carmageddon
description:
Carmageddon for Sony PlayStation - is a unique version of the first game from the Carmageddon series.

Due to the serious PlayStation's hardware limitations nearly everything was done from scratch for this release. That is why all the levels are completely different from what was created for the original game. Also, the zombies were made as 3D models instead of sprites (by the way, there is no possibility to turn on pedestrians as an alternative to zombies, but their blood is still red).

name: Carmageddon: TDR 2000
description: Cancelled port for the Game Boy Color.

name: Carmageddon TV
description: Sin descripción

name: Immersion Pack: Europa Universalis IV - Origins
description:
Europa Universalis IV - Origins includes:
- Jewish Religion: The Ethiopian Jews of Beta Israel are included, and Jewish nations can choose from nine religious characteristics to accentuate their national strengths.
- New Regional Mission Trees: New Missions for minor powers in Central, East and West Africa, as well as the African Horn.
- New Army Sprites: 4 new army sprites each for Congo, Great Lakes, Southern Africa and Bantu nations.
- Two New Missionary models: African Coptic and African Fetishist missionary animations added.

name: Anarchy Reigns: Bayonetta Pack
description: This exclusive Bayonetta pack brings the most infamous female fighter to the close combat brawler that is Anarchy Reigns. With her flair, kick-ass combos, torture attacks and multiple killer weapons, Bayonetta is a fantastic addition to the Anarchy Reigns online multiplayer experience.

name: Dota 2: New Frontiers
description: A new map, major gameplay changes, and so much more. It's a whole new world to explore.

name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files
description: The Muckingham Files will take you to never-before-seen places from the original universe of the base game, with new characters, locations and stories. Get to know more about your stomping ground and its inhabitants as the most in-demand power washer in town.

name: Trivial Trivia
description: Trivial Trivia is a multiplayer trivia game, where you set the questions and the right and wrong answers. A fun party game to play with your friends, where you can test their knowledge about anything!

name: Daydream: Prologue
description: Little Griffin is trapped in an ominous new world with his only friend, Birly the teddy bear. Solve clever puzzles and encounter terrifying creatures as the pair embark on a journey to discover what lurks beyond their nightmares.

name: DOOMpad
description: DOOM mirrored in a text editor

name: Camper Van: Make it Home
description: Camperize your own van. Embark on a journey of personal discovery, while you decorate and create a space for all your belongings.

name: Haunted Casino
description: Sin descripción

name: Line: Monster Farm
description:
The latest work of the legendary breeding game "Monster Farm"!
Monsters are born from Line friends, raised and battled!

name: Green Reaper
description: Play as Rubin, a rose ensorcelled by the goddess Antheia and entrusted with her sacred scythe. Mushroom marauders have invaded the greenhouse, targeting the garden goddess and choking the life out of her children. It is your duty to traverse the expanse of the greenhouse and slay these invaders.

name: Cards of the Realm
description: A lightweight deck builder. Explore over a dozen unique zones and collect heroes for your deck.

name: Underground Blossom
description: Underground Blossom is an upcoming adventure game by Rusty Lake. Fulfil various tasks at every station to find the metro that will take you through each important event from Laura Vanderboom's life.

name: 2 Volt
description: Use electric beams to interact with the environment and discover its secrets.

name: God of Weapons
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in God of Weapons, an action roguelike where you must ascend the tower of Zhor to reclaim the last light for the world. To survive the monster onslaught on each tower's level, you'll need to obtain and carefully organize weapons and accessories in your inventory.

name: Humankind: Together We Rule Expansion Pack
description: Unite Humankind with the Together We Rule Expansion Pack! Features the Congress of Humankind, 1 new currency (Leverage), 1 new quarter unlocking new inter-empires actions (Embassy), 3 new units (Agent), 6 New Cultures with Diplomatic Affinity, and more...

name: VTube Studio: VNet Multiplayer Collab
description: VNet is VTube Studio's built-in multiplayer collab system!! Just select the collab participants, load your model and you're ready to go!!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Heretic Pack
description: Show your devotion to the Old Faith with Cult of the Lamb: Heretic Pack. This cosmetic set includes new Follower forms, a set of dastardly decorations for your Cult, and Fleece of the Old Faith for the Lamb to wear.

name: Project: InfoGrid
description: Project InfoGrid is 2.5d scifi rocket game. You are tasked with maneuvering through tight obstacles to reach the other end of each level. Starting simple but progressively becoming more unnatural as you progress through the tests. You'll need to adapt when to be patient or quick. Best of luck pilot.

name: Don't Take It Personally, I Just Don't Like You
description: The lo-fi anime dating sim to cry to. A love letter to cassette tapes, old computers, and unrequited romance.

name: Stickman and the Sword of Legends
description: Stickman needs to get the Sword of Legends to be able to leave his planet that is about to explode.

name: Bad Times at the Silver Lake
description: Immerse yourself in the story of Sarah and her dog Shibu. Solve the mystery of the terrible virus infection and save the city of Salt Lake. Solve puzzles, shoot zombies and learn the terrible secrets of this city.

name: Missile Collector Man
description: Play game. Solve puzzle. Collect missile.

name: Guinea Pig Bridge!
description:
Guide a group of gullible guineas through a gauntlet of gizmos! Use the power of physics to propel, fling, and bounce them to safety!
Featuring an original soundtrack by Parry Gripp, Guinea Pig Bridge! is a whimsical puzzle game that will send you into cute overload. Each level is a lovingly crafted, fully 3D environment full of piggy perils. As the game progresses, you’ll unlock different types of bridge blocks that guineas can interact with in different (and often hilarious) ways. But only the right combination will get them safely from point A to point B, so you’ll have to experiment! Trial and error has never been more adorable—or more derpy—than this.

name: UltiMatt
description: UltiMatt is a fast-paced action-packed one touch ultimate frisbee game.

name: Best of British: Summer Sports
description:
The game created by the very best of British developers in only 48 hours at BoB Hack!
Experience the thrill of the strange world of Best of British: Summer Sports - poke boxers in the eyes, please cats, race vikings and electrocute synchronised swimmers.

name: Nonstop Arrow
description:
It is an archery game that hits a target in a rotating object.
It is a simple but never easy game.
There are a number of levels and you will need a variety of strategies.

name: Dobraminhos
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Kitty World
description:
Hello Kitty World is a real-time theme park simulation game created and developed by Sanrio (Nifty/Sanrio Wave Inc. ). Hello Kitty World was released on April 9, 2012 and is available to play on smart phones and iPad.

In Hello Kitty World, players can attempt to develop and create their own Sanrio Amusement Parks. Players are then able to expand their businesses and grow their theme park from the ground up, through a series of goals.

name: Hello Kitty World 2
description:
The sequel to Hello Kitty World, the popular theme park simulation game with over 5 million downloads worldwide!
From Hello Kitty and My Melody to Pompompurin, Kiki & Lala, Kuromi, and Cinnamoroll, the game features a huge cast of Sanrio's beloved characters!
Now you can see your own personal avatar in the park! It's now possible to coordinate outfits with Sanrio’s adorable fashion styles.
Craft decorations for your favorite characters and create your very own special park!

name: Dream House Days
description: Dream House Days is an apartment management game, where you furnish apartments, and slowly grow your building into a place anyone would be happy to live in! You must furnish each apartment to your tenants' needs and be a good landlord, as well as making a profit.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer
description: The original Aru Kanrinin no Koi game released in 2011 for PC.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer Free Edition
description: This was originally released with the bonus episodes, but they were later removed and rereleased in the Complete Edition.

name: Sengoku Turb
description:
A top-down Zelda type affair, features big-headed cats and a very awkward mouse-based movement system. The character follows the general scroll direction of the mouse, until you toggle it off with a click.

It was later reimagined in Dreamcast.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Spring + Summer Complete Edition
description: A port of Aru Kanrinin no Koi: spring + summer Free Edition with additional content.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Autumn + Winter
description: A sequel to Aru Kanrinin no Koi: spring + summer currently in development.

name: Aru Kanrinin no Koi: Between the Seasons
description: A visual novel currently in development.

name: Sonic 3 Fighter Sonic
description: Sonic 3 Fighter Sonic, known simply as Fighter Sonic on the title screen, is an unlicensed platform game for the Game Boy Advance by Sintax.

name: Disney's Mulan Training Game
description: Disney's Mulan Training Game is an Adobe Shockwave game made to promote the release of Mulan.

name: Madness Chambers
description: Madness Chambers is an incredibly addictive and action packed physics platform shooter

name: Puzzle Party VR
description: Multiplayer puzzles in virtual reality.

name: The Goblins are Coming
description: Arm Yourself! The Goblins Are Coming! Become the last line of defense to protect your lords treasure from unrelenting attacks from goblin hordes. In this action based tower defense style game protect your lords treasure chests from goblin raiders.

name: Pixels N Pistols
description: Take aim at cute little (blood thirsty) pixel enemies and send them to the void with an arsenal of over 25 weapons. Fight against soldiers, zombies, ninjas, and both the living and undead versions of Fascist Frank.

name: City of Dusk
description: Twilight City is a thrilling 3D block zombie defense shooter set in The end of the world is coming, face the endless attacking zombies, please live to the end...

name: Bone Boy
description: Feeling bad to the bone? Shred through the body as Bone Boy - learn rad tricks, help your friends and collect epic hats along the way. Get out there and tear it up, kid!

name: Hotdog Samurai
description: Hotdog Samurai! As a skilled hotdog, you'll battle through real world elements with one main goal in sight. Battle 20+ enemies throughout 7 adventure seeking levels, all while trying to complete in-game achievements.

name: Jackpot
description: Jackpot is a casual game. After starting the game, it has five wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.

name: Category Challenge
description: Category Challenge is a quiz game. The game will ask questions randomly, and there will be four answers below. The correct answer will enter the next question.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: The Dark Throne
description: Patch 6.4 introduces the next raid dungeon Pandæmonium: Anabaseios, a new trial and a new Instanced, Variant and Criterion dungeon.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Barro T23
description: The new gen for the T version!

name: Adventure Mosaics: Autumn Journey
description: Ellie used to think that autumn was a bad time to travel. This journey proved her wrong!

name: Dual Tennis
description:
Super Adrenaline rush when you reach 80-100 score range. Experience it!!.
Table Tennis games can be fun because you need rapid reflex to hit the ball back. But what happens when two tables are used to play table tennis? A lot!! Get an adrenaline rush trying to defeat the two opponents in this dual table tennis game. It’s a perfect mix of casual and arcade games with cool graphics and features.

name: Ketchapp Summer Sports
description:
Dreaming of becoming a star of the Summer Sports? Well, now you can!
Ketchapp Summer Sports is a fun arcade game to compete with your friends and worldwide.
Collect coins to unlock new items. Improve your timing and reaction skills to perfect your results.
Are you up for the ultimate challenge? Beat the world records!

name: Crossbar Kevin
description:
Kev­in is a young boy that en­joys play­ing foot­ball in the garden. He loves to score goals.
However, his fath­er, Big Mick, feels that is not the best use of his time.
In or­der to hone Kev­in's skills, dad only wants him to hit the cross bar. If you achieve this then he is happy. If you don't then he will be pour scorn on your soul!
Are you ready to im­press dad?

name: Awkward Goalie
description:
Call it soccer or football, either way in this silly physics game you don't score goals, but you do progress by catching balls.
Tap and throw, dash your character around to catch and hit balls and not let your team down. Avoid explosive balls, collect coin balls and crash into minigame balls.
Progress through the game and unlock new gameplay mechanics, like moving gates, different types of gates, different types of balls (golden, minigame, etc) and some more.
To support your inner desire for self-expression, the game contains variety of characters to choose from.

name: SnowRacer: Ramps
description:
Grind, jump and dash to reach the top speed on your snowboard. Sledging in Ischgl is a thing of the past... make your way through countless beautiful worlds instead. Discover the snowy mountain village, the adventurous forest or the dangerous gorge. Swoosh down the slope and perform cool tricks to reach a new highscore. Beware of all the obstacles.
Don't be afraid to surf over high ramps and halfpipes and to collect power-ups. You can also unlock new characters by completing a bunch of challenging achievements. Oh, and another thing ... you're also not afraid of the Yeti, right?

name: Forever Drive
description:
From the makers of MiniSquadron and EpicWin we present Forever Drive!
Forever Drive is a racing game set in a beautiful 3D futuristic city made, in part, by You! Using the built-in Track Editor, tracks created by different players are joined together into a never-ending road to drive! Customise your car from a huge selection of paintwork and license plates and prepare to drive as far as you can before the clock runs out! Accumulate miles driven to level up and unlock even more cars, each with their own unique handling.

name: Mopar Drag N Brag
description:
Experience the thrill of burnouts, test your reaction time and go lightning fast with Mopar drivers Allen Johnson, Jeg Coughlin Jr. and Matt Hagan. Don’t just watch the race, strap in and hit the strip yourself and show everybody how it’s done! Take the wheel and share your time on Facebook and Twitter!
Experience power, Mopar Power! Get behind the wheel and feel the thrill, power, and performance of Mopar! Mopar or No Car!

name: Metal Racer
description: A new racing game has been released on iOS, which will satisfy your running instinct and combat instinct together.

name: GalaxyMotoCrossHD
description: Awesome motorbike game for iphone and iPad where you can compete with other players and friends through 34 different levels. Feel the adrenaline while making flips and riding lightening bikes and boost your speed by getting those extra power boosts. Are you ready for some bike racing?

name: Proun+ A Journey Through Modern Art
description: Proun+ is a great combination of art and a racing game, inspired by paintings by Mondriaan and Kandinsky.

name: Sudoku Candy Witch
description:
Sudoku has changed! Take the challenge and learn how to solve all new types of Sudoku patterns!
Sudoku Candy Witch blends classic Sudoku with innovative puzzle elements on a colorful, candy-coated quest! Travel through a beautiful world with Violet and friends to solve addictive puzzles that will change the way you look at Sudoku forever!

name: Don't Touch Red!!
description: Just tap the screen to bounce the ball. Avoid red obstacles, check your reflex, plan your path.

name: Ziggy Kids Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Doodle UFO
description: Doodle UFO is a simple and fun arcade game. Do not touch enemies , bricks and get the powerups to increase your score!

name: Kids Learn to Sort
description: Your kids will love Kids Learn to Sort, Intellijoy's latest preschool curriculum app. Thrilling your kids as they learn preschool fundamentals, Intellijoy's apps are clean and intuitive. Your children will love playing its numerous activities all on their own - without any assistance.

name: Baseball with Heads
description: Heads! Another wacky installment in the "with Heads" series, Baseball with Heads is a sports collector's dream! Enjoy baseball all year long! Baseball with Heads is a simple yet addictive pitching game. How long can you strike out batters before messing up?

name: Strong: Search for the Mightiest Person
description: How Strong Are You? A true test of (finger) strength: tap repeatedly to keep from buckling under the weight as more and more objects fall towards you, in increasing size!

name: Fireboy & Watergirl 2: The Forest Temple
description:
Never mix water with fire! Keep the harmony and let them find their way.
Fire Boy and Water Girl need to find their way to the right door. Guide them through each level. Avoid mixing fire with water. Collect all the diamonds, be also prepared to use the levers and interact with the objects to reach the final goal.

name: Ninety8
description:
Ninety8 is a card puzzle you'll love from the very first second. Really easy to learn, but extremely hard to reach the final card.
Pick it up for a few minutes when traveling, or dive into the mesmerizing gameplay for hours and hours. We bet you'll have a really hard time reaching the top card, but lots of fun while trying.

name: NanoLab Fighter
description:
A deadly virus is spreading rapidly, and it's up to you to develop the ultimate cure before it's too late. In this top-down arcade shooter game, you'll take command of a nano drone and navigate through various missions to destroy virus cells and complete research tasks. With changing challenges across 14 levels and a captivating graphical story, your innovative approach will be the key to saving humanity.
Choose from a selection of 8 unique tools / weapons and a variety of enhancements to create your own gameplay experience. But brute force won't always lead to success – use your tools carefully to avoid collateral damage and complete the mission with precision. With 3 levels of difficulty to choose from, each mission offers a unique gameplay approach that will keep you engaged.
The first 7 missions are available to play for free, and the remaining missions can be unlocked with a one-time in-app purchase. There are no ads to interrupt your gameplay experience. Plus, enjoy a nice original soundtrack that complements the game's thrilling gameplay.
But beware – not all cells are harmful, and destroying healthy cells can have serious consequences. Navigate your nano drone with accuracy to complete each mission without causing damage. Achievements will be rewarded for exceptional gameplay.
Inspired by medical science, this game offers a fictional take on real viruses and methods to fight them. We hope that playing our game will inspire you to explore the fascinating topic of real viruses and their impact on humanity. Don't wait – join the fight against the virus today!

name: Minky
description: Minky is a classic platformer/ Jump & Run in retro look. Help Minky on it's journey through 28 varied Levels. Collect all available coins and defeat different enemies to solve each stage.

name: Life of Snow Wolf
description: From the far zone of arctic circle , clan of wolves have raised and in this wolf simulator games you can raise your family and enjoy yourself by playing this wolf games free. Control your ultimate arctic wolf beast in our arctic wolf battle simulator, Attack your hidden prey to survive in the snow of the jungle in our action packed wolf free games. Arctic zone of wild wolf sim game is that range where u can play as the wolves were never been so entertaining ever before. Explore the snowy Jungle and extremely cold weather of snow also look for a prey to attack with your ultimate wolf in this wolf simulator game. Be an extreme aggressive wolf and lead to make your family and clan of wolves, hunt other wild animals that come within your sight for your hunger or survival in newest wolf games free and become a part of this wolf games free where u can play as the wolf and has babies.

name: Idle Siege: Army Tycoon Game
description:
You are a mighty warlord who has landed upon the Unconquerable Islands, seeking to put that name to the test. To rise to this challenge, you must make strategic decisions, battle through hardened defence systems, and turn every castle, kingdom and PvP arena into a fresh conquest!
Once you've made a plan, your base will work night and day, gathering resources and sending troops to clash with the enemy fortress—even while you sleep. So strike up the drums and march your army to war in this idle military simulator!
If it's multiplayer competition you're looking for, Idle Siege also offers a PvP mode where you'll go head-to-head with other players in gladiator combat.

Lead your war band into an online deathmatch! Plan your strategy wisely by matching five of your best Commanders with the most suitable units. Each gladiator battle takes place in a different arena, from a sunny forest to a molten volcano. Play with friends and discover who's the king of Idle Siege multiplayer!

As a crusader in a distant land, you must train the right troops, assign cunning Commanders, and tactically deploy your military to crush every battle. You'll need to experiment with different formations to find the perfect siege strategy to tear down each defence tower of every fortress and castle that stands in the way of your rise to power.

Unlock legendary warrior, knight, hero and king Commanders, such as Genghis Khan and Robin Hood. Turn the tide of battle with their unique war abilities to clash with enemies and crush the defence of each stronghold like a flaming hammer.

Build up your base and upgrade military installations to house your army. Upgrade knight, king, and crusader units among others in this engrossing war tycoon simulator. Set up a steady income of Gold and allocate resources carefully to hasten the rise of your kingdom and amass power for the multiplayer PvP arena.

One castle may require an army of Raiders and Sharpshooters to crush it in battle. Another may call for a clash with cannon, knight, and barbarian units. Whatever your tactic, you'll need to earn Gold to unlock more advanced military technology to fuel your conquest of the kingdom and tear down any defence!

Witness how every base, tower, castle, stronghold, or PvP opponent in the multiplayer deathmatch arena falls to your idle tycoon game strategies. In time, every kingdom in the Unconquerable Islands will know the might of your legion of crusader, king, knight, and other amazing units.

As this is an idle tycoon simulator, you should pay attention to your Gold income. Complete contracts in battle by capturing a tower or castle. Upgrade knights and give rise to an impressive army that can spread your conquest and might to every fortress and deathmatch arena in the kingdom.

name: The Tale of Food
description: Embark on a 2-million-word fantasy adventure as the descendant of the Food God. Collect and nurture Food Souls as you explore time and space! Interact with them closely and record every precious moment.

name: Stunt Rush: 3D Buggy Racing
description: Stunt Rush is an arcade racing game that combines the intense survival action with the exploration of an atmospheric world. Your garage consists of blazing fast buggy cars that allow you to boost, steer in air, jump off the ramps and even rewind time backwards!

name: Crash N Dash
description: Join thousands of other players in a social, addicting, real-time multiplayer car-crasher game where you are encouraged to crash all the cars you want! Or you can play through a range of levels, achievements and unlockables in the single player version.

name: Jump or Roll Game
description:
Stickly is better than ever, and this time he has a partner in crime ... his girlfriend (Sticklet).
Join the two of them in the newest game from evertap - Jump or Roll.
I know it sounds easy with only 2 options (jump/roll), but looks
can be deceiving!
Try your best to make it as far as possible, and don't forget to grab
as many PowerUps and Coins along the way ... they'll come in handy!

name: Junk Race
description:
Have a blast competing with other players in this casual shoot 'em up multiplayer race!
Fueled by only raw skill and food truck deliciousness, you'll kill random players in real-time to earn cash and trophies.

name: FuturCity Taxi
description:
FuturCity is a city in the future where it's good to live.
Play as a taxi driver, drop-off your customers to their destination as fast as possible.
Avoid obstacles, take boosts and time bonus to be the best.
As time goes by, the difficulty increases, the timer is accelerating and customers call you more and more.
Stay calm and find the best routes to save time.
Your total score will be recorded and you can share it on the internet to show your level to the world.

name: Archer: Sheshou
description:
Help the Archer (Sheshou) hunt the ducks flying overhead before the timer expires. Use the left and right buttons to move the archer, and tap on the screen to shoot arrows. The lanterns will block your arrows from hitting the ducks.
Try to beat the high score!

name: InterAct
description:
The Intec InterAct is a console made by Intec, and is a knockoff of the Nintendo Wii, likely released shortly after the original.

The InterAct is approximately the size of a Super Nintendo cartridge and weighs only 1 pound. It has just a composite video output and monaural audio.

The InterAct comes with four controllers. One of which resembles a typical game console controller. Another one is attached to the user's leg and used for playing the Soccer game. The other two are called GenieCons, but resemble Wii remotes. All the controllers are flimsy and cheap like the InterAct console and could break in half during hard play.

It comes with two cartridges which are extremely small. Most of the games on the console are multicarts. The games found on it are mostly by Waixing.

One cartridge is the Sports cartridge which contains 8 games. The other cartridge contains 32 games, which brings the total to 40. All of them have equally poor control mechanics, are poorly designed, and are extremely difficult to play.

name: Place Kick Master Football Championship
description:
Place Kick Master Football Championship (Waixing, license: 2006SR15690) is a football place kick simulation game with confusing gameplay and controls. Title screen graphics are stolen and edited from "The Ultimate 11: SNK Football Championship" in Intec's version.

It was originally made for the Nintendo Entertainment System, but Intec has ported it to a cartridge for their console, and there is no information about these 2 versions and the version discussed below.

name: Bowling
description:
Bowling is a bowling simulation game with questionable gameplay and controls. Some graphics are stolen from Half-Life and other games in Intec's version.

It was originally made for the Nintendo Entertainment System, but Intec has ported it to a cartridge for their console, and there is no information about these 2 versions and the version discussed below.

name: Island Clicker
description:
Welcome to Island Clicker – where every click opens the door to an unexplored world!

Explore the Island: Chop down your first tree, crack open your first stone, and step by step, delve deeper into the mysteries of this enigmatic island. The further you venture, the more resources you find, and with each upgraded tool, you become even stronger!

Tame Loyal Companions: Don’t face this adventure alone! Find and tame a monkey to work tirelessly by your side, a wolf ready to tear through your enemies, or a cat that brings you the kind of luck you’ve only dreamed of.

What Do the Shadows Hide?: The island is filled with secrets – from a strange broken totem by the lake to a mysterious bunker hidden among the trees. What are these places, and how can you access them? What secrets do they hold? Perhaps the answers lie behind doors that are still locked. Can you unravel all the mysteries that this land holds?
