name: Great God Grove
description:
Way up high on a mountaintop sits the Grove, a realm peacefully inhabited by charismatic deities and their devoted human worshippers. That was, until the pantheon's King began spreading insults and disinformation.

Now the gods and their followers have devolved into bickering and fighting! In Great God Grove, players assume the role of Godpoke, the mail carrier for this fractured pantheon. Creatively deliver messages and set the story straight... before the apocalypse consumes us all!

name: Cave Crawler
description: Cave Crawler is a short horror game where you pilot a drone into a cave and discover something horrible.

name: Alias
description: A.L.I.A.S. Is a run and gun game where you play as a cybernetic soldier who has to fight a bunch of robots.

name: LocoRoco Midnight Carnival
description:
Roll, jump, bounce and ‘boing’ your way through a mysterious moonlit fairground built by the mischievous BuiBui. Just watch out for the fiendish traps and devious hazards they’ve left behind!

16 classic LocoRoco levels in this playful platformer originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Primer
description: Find all the prime factors!

name: Everyday Puzzles
description: Crossword, Word Search, Password, Hashtag, Cladder, Sudoku, and Tangle. All these incredible games are part of Everyday Puzzle. With these puzzle games, you can challenge friends, guess the answers, improve spelling, and beat them.

name: Street Chaser
description: Your companion was robbed by a gang, You can help by running behind the robber to catch them. Run as fast as you can, Dodge the obstacles coming your way. Chase thief without loosing, Catch them by throwing bottles and kicking balls hitting them!

name: Udoiana Raunes
description: An old parody of the Indiana Jones Point and Click games.

name: Mega Man X Innocent Impulse
description: Mega Man X Innocent Impulse is a story-rich open-world Mega Man X fangame in active development. Featuring an enhanced 8-bit graphical style and soundtrack.

name: RuPaul's Drag Race Superstar
description: Enter the iconic Werk Room and experience the fantastic fashion-conscious world of RuPaul’s Drag Race. Werk your way to be the top fashion designer and become a superstar stylist. Go shopping and select from hundreds of fashion dress-up pieces, put on that makeup and create the fiercest look to slay the runway.

name: Asura The Striker
description: Respect and homage to the arcade games of the 80s and 90s, This is an arcade-style 3D shooter with speed and exhilaration. Play as Asura, a humanoid combat weapon, and destroy the invaders from outer space.

name: A Kiss From Death
description:
1905, Sal Island, Cape Verde.

Lucinda, a curious 7-year-old girl, meets a strange and mysterious child at the cemetery. Despite their eerie personality, Lucinda finds herself drawn to the child's captivating presence and befriends them. However, their friendship is short-lived when she moves away to a different island.

Fast-forward to years later, as Lucinda returns to her hometown to get married, she is shocked to see her old friend again. But as she delves deeper into the past, she realizes that her friend is not who they seem to be, and their reunion brings with it a trail of unsettling secrets and revelations related to their separation and to her own destiny.

name: Dynasty Warriors 5: Special
description:
Dynasty Warriors 5: Special includes content from Dynasty Warriors 5 and Dynasty Warriors 5 Xtreme Legends (excluding the Edit Mode and Destiny Mode features). Sports higher resolution graphics and includes the Japanese and English tracks.

The game was exclusive to East Asian regions.

name: Uldor Dread Arena
description: Uldor Dread Arena is a 3d rogue-lite where you face off against endless waves of the undead minions. Players choose from one of multiple characters with varying stats and weapons, and after each wave, you are able to upgrade stats, weapons, or unlock special abilities.

name: Deadly Road
description:
Escape the dangerous path of Deadly Road!

Get ready for an almost impossible challenge and push your skills to the limit to jump over prickly and dangerous obstacles and escape from the deadly road!

This game placed 2nd in the Game Boy Showdown Jam on itch.io

name: Rewind Time
description: Rewind Time is a puzzle game where you can go back in time. All moved objects return to their original location after using that power. Once a chest is placed in the right place, it will no longer be affected by time. You can't rewind time when you are standing on the original location of a chest (so you have to memorize the location of all the chests).

name: Paranormal Mission

name: With the Last Moonbeam
description: Walk, jump, climb, and glide through this platformer adventure as Moss works to mend the Moonheart. Along the way, you'll meet the other inhabitants of Moss's home moon... and perhaps find some secrets too.

name: Urban Crooks
description:
Multiplayer shooter, with fast paced fights like never seen before!
Enter the city of San Gracas, the hub of corruption and gang warfare, occupied by crooks and low lives, leading its inhabitants to adapt or break bad.

name: Bloons Supermonkey 2
description: Level-based vertical shooter based on the Bloons franchise of games. Customise your Supermonkey with various weapons and use limited powerups to find the right combination to beat each of the 100 levels with a perfect score.

name: CMSR
description: CMSR is a Car game. Tune up, fix, collect, sell cars, Car customization and 3d tuning.

name: Galactic Gluttony
description: Agent Red has one job, to hide the existence of aliens. But when a UFO shows up and starts dropping their food everywhere, things start to get a little troublesome. The fastest way to get rid of all the food? Eating it, obviously.

name: The Ultimate FMV Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the ultimate bundle for their very best FMV games! Featuring The Complex, Late Shift, The Bunker, The Shapeshifting Detective and The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker in one bundle!

name: Van Crane Bundle
description: Use Van Crane's deadly weapons to root out the cursed plague haunting the streets of Harran with your ancient arms, forged especially to kill what cannot die.

name: Pinball FX: Universal Monsters Pack
description: Two scarily authentic tables based on the Universal Monsters—Monster Bash and Creature from the Black Lagoon! Play in their perfectly simulated original form or as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

name: The Interactive Movie Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer two of their very best interactive movies, The Complex and Late Shift, in one bundle!

name: Last Period
description:
Last Period takes place in a world where the desperate souls of the dead become reincarnated monsters who seek to terrorize the world.
As the main protagonist, your job is to venture out into the world as you seek to break curse of this reincarnation!

name: Nature is Hungry
description: After a plane crash, fight for survival against deadly predators. Gather essential supplies to stay alive and uncover the mystery behind two long-dead skeletons and the crocodiles' presence. In this horror FPS game, the night is your greatest enemy. Can you survive until dawn and solve the mystery?

name: RimWorld: Console Edition - Chronicles Bundle
description:
The Chronicles Bundle includes:
- RimWorld: Console Edition
- RimWorld: Console Edition - Royalty DLC
- RimWorld: Console Edition - Ideology DLC

name: TramSim: Console Edition - Deluxe
description: Urban Transport comes to life in TramSim: Console Edition - Deluxe! Experience more with Munich and Vienna, including additional content for the city of Vienna, the ULF Type Tram and the detailed Vienna Depot. Run to the timetable and face unique challenges, there is gameplay for every taste!

name: TramSim: Console Edition
description: Urban Transport comes to life in TramSim: Console Edition! Experience photorealism in two European cities, Vienna & Munich, no matter where you are in the world, and drive realistic trams on a variety of lines. Run to the timetable and face unique challenges, there is gameplay for every taste!

name: Pinball FX: Jurassic World️ Pinball
description: With one pinball table based on Jurassic World and two more inspired by Jurassic Park, you know what that means - Life found a way!

name: Astronaut Bundle
description:
The bundle contains:

- Laser rifle: The V-23 Eraser
- Stasis pistol: The V-40 Suspender
- Machete: The V-27 Shifter
- Outfit: The V-9 Defender Suit
- Buggy skin: The V-39 Star Rover

name: Tap Shap
description: Tap Shap is a unique, free-to-play, addictive game & the world's first multi-platform reaction game!

name: Rest House III: Chlorophilia
description: Explore Rest House III intriguing world and step into a dark and wet Chlorophilia. Psychological first person adventure. All the population moved to the capital. You are special correspondent of the famous journal. Disaster! What will happen to the earth in the future? Psychological human dilemmas.

name: Family Farm 2023
description: Welcome to Family Farm 2023, the ultimate farming stimulation game where you own an entire island and can crop, breed, and build to your heart's content. With over 22 crops and a variety of animals, factories, and decorations, the possibilities are endless. Play now and build your dream farm!

name: Brave Adventurer
description: Brave Adventurer - The story of a vagabond who travels through Middle-earth and is the victim of an attack by bandits, resulting in serious injury. You enter the world of demons through the use of dark magic.

name: HellCat 2: The Riot Inferno
description: HellCat 2: The Riot Inferno is an alternate history of a hurricane cat in a red scarf.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Hidden Paradise
description:
A perfect place for a weekend getaway with friends. This DLC includes:
- Roller coaster map: Hidden Paradise.
- One roller coaster cart.

name: Intervallic
description: In this 2D sidescrolling rhythm game use your MIDI instrument or computer keyboard to guide a robot alien cat through space!

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Little World
description: Yun Tianming gave Cheng Xin a small universe, and I also want to give you one!

name: Derpy Dino
description: Derpy Dino is a game where you are the last dinosaur alive. You try your best to survive and keep the dinosaurs from becoming extinct but be aware... meteors are crashing down.

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Return of Rome
description:
Welcome to Return of Rome, a completely new type of expansion pack which brings Age of Empires, the title that started it all, into Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition as a brand new self-contained experience. This new expansion will allow you to challenge friends with the original sixteen Age of Empires civilizations - plus one brand-new Return of Rome exclusive civilization, the Lac Viet- and relive the triumph and trials of antiquity. Battle your way across the ancient world with three new campaigns featuring conquerors, empire-builders, and gifted tacticians fighting desperately against fate! As an additional bonus, the Romans will no longer be bound by time as they become a new playable civilization within Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition, ready to battle in the new Age.

Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Return of Rome is the fourth expansion of Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition. It was announced on 25 October 2022, on the 25th Anniversary of Age of Empires. It ports Age of Empires content into the Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition client.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 7
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: DungeonSmash
description: A simple and addictive game where you break blocks in medieval dungeons.

name: I Made Myself an AI
description: Build circuits and manage heat as you complete tasks in this surprisingly intuitive puzzle game unlike anything you've ever played before.

name: Abscission
description: Abscission is a Lovecraftian, story-driven horror point-and-click investigation game. It involves searching crime scenes for evidence, combining clues and questioning suspects. Puzzles can have multiple solutions as you guide the protagonist - Detective Will Stanhope - through the story.

name: Snakedate
description: Welcome to Charmr, the premier dating app for snakes! Looking for love? Cruise around the club and wrap around your dates to show your affection!

name: Scrolls of Fire
description:
Seek power in the depths of the dungeon!
There are 2 floors filled with unique enemies and bosses to defeat.

You can also find scrolls that you can mix and match to upgrade your attacking capabilities, but dying means starting from square one.

name: Antbassador
description: Take control of The Antbassador, a giant human finger with a tophat, as he makes his way through a bustling ant colony. You must use your prodigious digit to help the citizens of Antopia without causing an international incident!

name: IndependAnt
description: Explore the vast Living Room to find food for your struggling ant colony in this cute and casual collectathon!

name: Bale Out
description: Bale Out is a short, relaxing puzzle game with a unique puzzle mechanic: AI prediction. Save barnyard animals by learning their movement patterns and manipulating the environment!

name: Celestial Crowns
description: The King is dead! Take the throne in this choice-rich fantasy game and save your Kingdom by reviving ancient magic that's been lost to your family for generations. Customize your character and play through three different romantic routes!

name: The Oregon Trail: Cowboys and Critters
description: Embark on new journeys, cook for real cowboys, and discover the legends of fearsome critters.

name: SBK15
description:
With over 4.5 million downloads under its belt and the support of passionate fans worldwide, the SBK Official Mobile Game is back for a new season.
Join the fray in the 2015 eni FIM Superbike World Championship: pick the bike of your dreams from the biggest brands in the world (Aprilia, Kawasaki, Honda, Ducati, Suzuki, MV Agusta, BMW) and hit the track! Ride shoulder to shoulder with the big guys, such as former champions Tom Sykes and Sylvain Guintoli! Break their records in Challenge Mode or push yourself to the limit in the new Time Attack Mode and don’t be afraid to unleash your inner speed demon!

name: Who Stole Me?
description:
Someone stole me and my friends and put us in bubbles!
Match colors and set us free in this addictive physics puzzler.

name: Overbeast
description: An enormous Overbeast has appeared in your state. Work with your neighbours to restore its habitat. As your Overbeast gets stronger, watch it battle rival states, rising through the ranks to become the ultimate overbeast.

name: Subway Surfers Blast
description:
Match, blast, and decorate with your favorite characters from the Subway Surfers universe! Solve the puzzles and unveil new wonders every day.
Billions of fans all over the world have been asking for more Subway Surfers games - now we are answering your call with Subway Surfers Blast. Solve fun puzzles, collect stars, decorate your hangout, and much more!
Hip, hop, bounce, and blast your way through the coolest game around!

name: Bobblehead College Football
description:
Bobblehead College Football is the best college football game on iOS. Build your dream college, recruit a promising team of young bobbleheads and take them into battle against other players in head-to-head or simulated matches. Carefully manage your campus resources and hone your football strategy to reach the top of the leaderboard.
Can you become the next Bobblehead Champion?!

name: Mystical Stones
description:
The universes needs a savior! Is it you?
A long time ago, long before our world was created, lived four goddesses.
In their temple hidden amid the clouds, in the company of their faithful companions, their role was to regulate the whole universe by directing sacred stones on a board. Each of their actions changed destinies.

name: Tiny Tennis
description: Move your player to hit oncoming tennis balls and avoid flying water bottles.

name: Running Strike
description: Running Strike is a real-time multi-player strategic game. You are running on randomly generated tracks to battle with other players, instantly. As a player, your mission is to guide our characters to overcome all obstacles along the track and win the game. With the help of items, skills and talent, you can choose the best strategy for each match. Players, join the world of Running Strike, lead our characters to success and be the Master of Running!

name: Soul of Heroes: Empire Wars
description:
An all-new mobile EPIC RPG experience with immersive tactical strategies alongside fast paced hero growth to keep you going!
Play as memorable hero characters from different cultures from around the world and history!

name: Dungeon, Inc.
description:
As Dungeon, Inc.’s new Gold Production Manager, you must maximize profits by any means necessary. Nothing is too devious to consider - if it works! Build your dungeon deeper, expand into new environments, and recruit mischievous monsters; the more you tap, the bigger the dungeon, and the more gold you make!
Collect monsters to help defend your dungeon from pesky Tax Knights and rival managers - then send your monsters off to sabotage others! When the insurance value of your dungeon is high enough, trigger an ‘accident’ to cash in on your value and start again. What are YOU willing to do to become Manager of the Week?

name: The Oregon Trail: Boom Town
description:
Get ready to experience life as a pioneer in this reimagining of the classic game, The Oregon Trail! A game that combines adventure, simulation, and settlement survival. Build, grow, craft and harvest as you turn the small frontier village, of Independence Missouri, into a thriving boom town!
Dysentery, Cholera, Typhoid and snakes - oh my! Help Settlers survive the dangerous journey west in this re-imagining of the classic game, The Oregon Trail!

Help pioneers survive the trail, and prepare for their dangerous journey across the Oregon Trail and outfit settlers with all the supplies they need to survive! Follow the progress of the Pioneers as their wagons forge the way west across America’s frontier on their way to a new life. The wagons may call for supplies along the way, so be ready to collect resources and send them food, tomatoes, corn, eggs, medicine, clothes or whatever else they need to survive. Challenge your survival skills as you fix your wagons and face the harsh desert conditions.

Create the town of your dreams in this town-building simulator game! Start with building marketplaces, shops, and saloons on your own land. Upgrade with a port, rail station, museum, or even a university for your villagers. Arrange and rearrange your layout. Add decorations, design, upgrade and monuments to make your town beautiful. As you level up, new buildings are unlocked, opening exciting new possibilities. With hard work and creativity, you can truly build the Independence of your dreams!

Design, Manage and grow your very own frontier boom town in this farming and city building simulator inspired by the classic game The Oregon Trail! Plant, collect, and harvest crops, raise and care for a variety of farm animals on the land, build stores, factories and more as you help prepare pioneers for their journey west along The Oregon Trail. The town of their dreams is in your hands!

Go beyond your own town to participate in a wide variety of weekly and seasonal events. You can connect with your friends or family, join a clan, and compete or collaborate in special challenges.
Are you ready? Do you have the skill, foresight, and creativity to turn Independence into a Boom Town? Hopeful settlers are gathering in Independence, counting on you to make their dreams come true. The journey begins when you join this thrilling town-building simulator game—The Oregon Trail: Boom Town!

name: Crashy Cars!
description: Get cars across the intersection. Pick up coins, avoid obstacles, score points and unlock special cars! Don’t crash!

name: Zombie Race: Undead Smasher
description: Incredible zombie smasher! Drive your way through a zombie apocalypse or have your brain eaten. Cruise your vehicle through deserts and abandoned forests that are guarded by hordes of zombies, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy more powerful ones. Steer your car to keep balance on the hills while trying to smash zombies into debris.

name: Grant of God
description: This is a synchronous turn-based card battle game where you build your card deck through the combination of characters, weapons and equipment to meet any challenge. welcome to my world:the land of godgrant.

name: Medusa VR
description: Medusa, the Croatian word for jellyfish. Medusa VR is 10 minute solo-developed VR film. Join Russel and Zlatan - two Croatian actors in Califonia for a coffee by the canal as they discuss grief, change and loss. When on strange shores, would you swim with Medusas?

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo II: Minako
description: The sequel to "Tenshi-tachi no Gogo"; instead of playing as the obnoxious male protagonist of the previous game, the player takes control of Minako, a female Japanese high-school student with a strong interest towards sexuality. The story mainly depicts Minako's sexual encounters with men and women, which take place on school grounds, in various locations of the city, etc.

name: 'The
description:
Mario goes on another quest to save the kingdom. What obstacles will he be facing this time?

'the (also known as Coronation Day) is a Horror themed Super Mario World ROM Hack released in January 2016. The hack features Mario in a forest like environment, with various messages coming from a strange, disembodied voice, but there's something more to it than that...

name: 100 Rooms of Enemies
description:
Do you like the "Pit of 100 Trials" side-challenges from the Paper Mario games?

If you did, then you'll sure like this concept. 100 Rooms of Enemies is a enemy rush platformer that consists of 100 setups for the player to go through.
Think of this as if you're in an arcade game; you essentially try to improve your record as you die many times. If you succeed to conquer Room 100, you'll be prized with a reward that stands as a reminder that you completed the game.
What kind of prize?
You'll have to improve all of your skills to find out!

name: Super Mario World Odyssey
description: This hack features Mario’s ability to possess enemies and bounce on his cap a la Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Otoko Cross: Naked Remix
description: The Naked Remix is a bundle that includes Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire + Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire!

name: Company of Heroes 3: Console Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Snowboarder MP
description: A multiplayer 2D racing snowboarder game. Featuring weather effects and procedurally generated tracks. The objective is simple, invite your friends and compete to reach the finish line first.

name: Inspector Gadget: Mad Time Party
description: Go Go Gadget! Become the famous Inspector Gadget and have fun with your friends in this brand-new adventure!

name: PlateUp!: Collector's Edition
description:
PlateUp!: Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: PlateUp!
- 4 Mini Figurines

name: Hayarigami 1, 2, 3 Pack
description: Hayarigami 1-2-3 Pack is a horror visual novel game that includes Hayarigami: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File, Hayarigami 2: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File, and Hayarigami 3: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File game.

name: Shadows Over Loathing: Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo: Fantabulous Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Many Pieces of Mr. Coo: Coollector Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: M Hold'em
description: M Hold'em is an app where you can play the mind sport “Texas Hold'em” with tramps and points.

name: Sayonara Umihara Kawase Smart
description:
This is a 2D platform game using a rubber rope. You can play 10 free stages.

"Sayonara UmiharaKawase Smart" is a 2D platform game where the goal is to clear every stage.
The rules are very simple: Using a rubber rope with a lure at the tip, you can hang on walls or ceilings and catch enemies while aiming for the exit inside the stage.

name: Under the Witch's Trial
description:
What happens when you transmigrate into a story… where everyone's a villain?

After leaving a critical review of a tropey and grimdark RPG where the main character experiences and perpetuates nothing but tragedy, you… accidentally reincarnate into that very game.

Unfortunately for you, your role is that of a cannon fodder two-bit villain, who exists only for the protagonist to murder in his first act of vengeance against those who've wronged him.

To make matters worse, an alluring villainess offers to help you out—At a price, of course. With both the protagonist's and villainess's eye on you, you must find a way to obtain power and ensure your survival—before it’s too late.

name: Star Trek
description: Star Trek is a space strategy text adventure, featuring the characters from the classic series.

name: Grand War 2
description:
Conquer the turbulent European, and win all the war of history in Europe!
The world is about to change! Build your own empire and command army, and battle as one of the great general from the history of the world.
It is time for you to create winning strategy and tactics, mobilize army and make immortal achievements!

name: Cat Escape! Infinity！
description: Do you like the game of cat and mouse? Are you ready to challenge the squid game and win the final victory to survive? The most popular hide and seek endless version of the game is back again, which adds a lot of Kawaii's cat image and a lot of little girl's skin for you to choose from. look out! The furry cat has begun to look for your trace. Hide and win!

name: Mr Bea Boy Kart Dash Race
description: Collect the power of Mr funny bean’s Family amulets that transform your character's special power, which will help you along the temple way and run to defeat opponents!

name: Line Bubble 2
description: Enjoy exciting gameplay together with Line's Brown and Cony, as you toss bubbles around to solve puzzles!

name: Snowball Go Go Go
description: Have you ever seen snow and rolled over snowballs? I hope to bring a trace of cool to you on the hot summer days.

name: Idle Quest Giver
description: Ever wanted to start and manage a mercenary guild? Use your tavern as a mercenary base. Attract new mercenaries to your ranks! Add and upgrade new rooms in your tavern. Take care of your heroes otherwise they will not be able to complete quests. Increase your guild rating to have more heroes and more quests!

name: Idle Ocean Cleaner Eco Tycoon
description: Join players to help the planet by Cleaning up its Oceans! A brand new in idle tycoon games - a free clicker game. Take role of recycle coach cleaner and gold miner simulator to rescue the planet from eco trash. Build your garbage cleaning team and save the planet in one of the most exciting ocean explorer ecology games.

name: Tangerine Clicker
description: Become the richest tangerine farmer in our simulation. Organize the collection of tangerines in the garden with maximum speed and achieve it faster!

name: Idle Cutter
description: Create your personal sawmill, upgrade your saw and cut as many different logs as possible!

name: Rent Please!: Landlord Sim
description: As a good landlord, how will you build your community?

name: Legends Scrolls
description: Legends Scrolls is an idle RPG game. Join the warriors all over the grand land of Adela to fight the darkness behind the scenes with your teammates, and save the cursed world for the truth. The five main elements of water, fire, wind, light, and dark will help you all the way! Start your adventure now!

name: Farm Jam: Animal Parking Game
description: Meet the Farm Jam parking game, a brilliant mix of a farming simulator parking games and a traffic puzzle in a beautiful 3D games form. You’ve just bought a ticket for a township farm sightseeing… Take your seats, lads, we’re going to Ol’ Sharpeye’s farmland!

name: Atlas Earth: Buy Virtual Land
description: Atlas: Earth is a location-based app where users can buy virtual land that mirrors real-world locations, 900 square feet at a time. Purchase land anywhere near your physical location in the real world and it’s yours to keep!

name: Car Cops
description: It is up to you to make sure everyone has no contraband!

name: Potion Punch 2: Cooking Quest
description: Potion Punch 2 takes the cooking fever to an all time high with baby dragons roasting ingredients, and magic wisps freezing your favorite treats or grilling your delicious steaks! Cook in ways that you've never seen before in a fast paced time-management game. Become the star chef through hundreds of levels teeming with amazing heroes and dastardly villains. Unfurl your scrolls, polish your frying pans, and open the restaurant doors, because it's time for cooking madness in Potion Punch 2!

name: Potion Punch
description:
Run and grow your own potion shop in the most colorful time-management game ever

Run and grow your own potion shop like a real boss in the most colorful time-management game ever!

name: Super Fight
description: It's a game of strategy and fun, with many different characters to choose from, not only immersing themselves in 5V5 combat, but also taking chances on various levels.

name: Night of Horror
description: You are on the night shift at the bank. You hear noises all the time. You need to find out what they are and find your partner. As you pass, you will need to find the keys and open locked rooms.

name: Trainz 2022: Ferrovia Appennino Centrale 1899
description: Drive through the Italian countryside in 1899 with this 133km long 950mm narrow gauge route with steep grades and 32 stations. Featuring a Couillet 0-6-0T steam locomotive, this route will present the challenges faced by pioneering steam locomotive crews!

name: Trainz Plus: Ferrovia Appennino Centrale 1899
description: Drive through the Italian countryside in 1899 with this 133km long 950mm narrow gauge route with steep grades and 32 stations. Featuring a Couillet 0-6-0T steam locomotive, this route will present the challenges faced by pioneering steam locomotive crews!

name: Rescue Team: Magnetic Storm
description: You find your world in danger once again, but this time by unprecedented natural disasters caused by intense solar activity. As you navigate a city in chaos, you'll act as the head of a team of rescuers tasked with helping people in need.
